summary: Admin portal: enhance Master Design order assignment to support managing and assigning Karigars (add new Karigar and reassign orders to existing Karigars).

existing_features.title: In the Admin Portal Master Designs page, add a top-level action near the existing “Add Mapping” button to add a Karigar name into the saved Karigar list.

In the Master Design add/edit dialog, replace the free-text Karigar Name input with a selection control that lets admins/staff choose from the previously added Karigars, and saves the selected Karigar as the mapping’s karigarName.
Add React Query hooks needed to fetch and mutate the Karigar list from the frontend admin portal.

new_feature_requests.summary: In Master Design admin portal, during edit of a design order (generic name / karigar name action), allow selecting a Karigar from previously added Karigars and assign the order to the selected Karigar.
In Master Design admin portal, add a top-level option near 'Add Mapping' to add a Karigar name so orders can be assigned to that Karigar.
Add backend support for maintaining a reusable list of Karigar names that can be assigned to master design mappings (create/read).
Update backend master design editing so that when a master design mapping’s karigarName is changed, existing stored orders for that design code are reassigned to the updated karigarName.

If the backend state schema changes to add persistent Karigar storage, implement a safe conditional upgrade migration so existing deployments upgrade without trapping and initialize the new Karigar storage to an empty state.
